title: Horizon Architecture
challenge: A high-end firm was losing prestige with a clunky, slow WordPress site that failed to showcase 4K architectural photography.
solution: Migrated to Next.js with localized edge delivery. Implemented 4K optimized image pipelines and a 'Virtual Tour' request system. Rejected standard builders to ensure absolute pixel perfection.
aiLayer: Automated image categorization and focal point detection using custom Vision API pipelines.

title: Apex Plumbing
challenge: The client had zero mobile visibility and a 'contact us' form that was buried, resulting in high bounce rates and lost revenue.
solution: Built a mobile-first lead funnel with one-tap calling and automated service area mapping. Integrated direct lead-to-SMS routing via Firebase Cloud Functions.
aiLayer: Intelligent lead-routing engine that analyzes urgency and geographic proximity to dispatch technicians.

title: ScentSuite AI
challenge: Users were overwhelmed by thousands of fragrance options, leading to choice paralysis and abandoned carts.
solution: Developed a heuristic AI recommendation engine (ScentMatch™) using Gemini 1.5 Pro to correlate user preferences with real-time stock availability.
aiLayer: ScentMatch™ Heuristic Engine: Normalizes relevance scores based on seasonal inventory biasing.

title: Lumina Bistro
challenge: Manual reservation management was leading to double-bookings and a disjointed brand experience online.
solution: Implemented a custom real-time reservation system with session persistence and an immersive, cinematic digital menu using motion-optimized assets.
aiLayer: Dynamic traffic forecasting model that optimizes table turn-over times based on historical booking data.
